description: Using runBlocking on main thread blocking UI. Coroutine anti-pattern causing ANR and poor responsiveness.
solutions: Replace runBlocking with launch or async
Use LiveData or StateFlow for reactive updates
prevention: Never use runBlocking on main thread
Design async APIs with suspend functions
Use lint rules to detect runBlocking on main
examples: // Good: lifecycleScope.launch { val data = repository.getData(); updateUI(data) }
// runBlocking only in tests or main() function
